name: CNA_1_Specifications_for_Conditions_and_Agreements
title: CNA.1 Specifications for Conditions and Agreements (Header)

statement.label: CNA.1#125
statement.requirement: Before download, a user can easily access the appâ€™s Terms of Use. This may be accomplished through a link in the app description in the relevant app store.

statement.label: CNA.1#126
statement.requirement: Before download, a use can easily access the appâ€™s Privacy Policy. This may be accomplished through a link in the app description in the app store.

statement.label: CNA.1#127
statement.requirement: [Rewards are given for app participation] Clearly disclose all conditions and time limitations governing rewards. These include but are not limited to: how activity is tracked; how promptly rewards are fulfilled; whether rewards can expire or be withdrawn; whether and how rewards can be transferred to another person; whether rewards can be accumulated into larger rewards; etc.

statement.label: CNA.1#128
statement.requirement: The consumer should indicate that they acknowledge and understand the app functionality.

statement.label: CNA.1#129
statement.requirement: [App includes in-app payments] The app description shall disclose what is included as base functionality without payment, and what functionality would require additional payment.

statement.label: CNA.1#130
statement.requirement: [App permits in-app payments] The benefits for paying for a service or feature are clearly stated in a manner which allows an account holder to make an informed decision about making or declining an in-app payment.

statement.label: CNA.1#131
statement.requirement: [App access is by subscription] The requirements for cancelling a subscription are clearly stated in the CnA.

statement.label: CNA.1#132
statement.requirement: [App requires an additional charge to upgrade] The upgrade charges, the amount of advance warning for upgrades, and the length of support for the old version (if not upgraded) are clearly stated in the CnA.

statement.label: CNA.1#133
statement.requirement: Disclose the use of advertising mechanisms, distinguish advertisements from app content, and provide ways to deactivate or skip advertisements.[1]

statement.label: CNA.1#134
statement.requirement: Provide a means for a user to access the appâ€™s Privacy Policy at any time during the usage of the app.
